original_text: God brought him forth out of Egypt; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn: he shall eat up the nations his enemies, and shall break their bones, and pierce them through with his arrows.
korean_text: 하나님이 그를 애굽에서 인도하여 내셨으니 그 힘이 들소와 같도다 그의 적국을 삼키고 그들의 뼈를 꺾으며 화살로 쏘아 꿰뚫으리로다

sentences.original_text: God brought him forth out of Egypt
he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 마치 들소의 힘을 가지고 있다

sentences.original_text: he shall eat up the nations his enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 원수인 민족들을 삼킬 것이다

sentences.original_text: and pierce them through with his arrows
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 화살로 그들을 꿰뚫을 것이다
